description.en-US: Notification Email sent to the customer to tell them that the refund of their return request has been processed.
description.en-CA: Notification Email sent to the customer to tell them that the refund of their return request has been processed.
description.fr-CA: Courriel de notification envoyé au client pour l'aviser qu'un remboursement de retour a été émis.

content.en-CA: Your refund request #{{Return.ReturnNumber}} for order #{{Return.OrderNumber}} has been processed
content.en-US: Your refund request #{{Return.ReturnNumber}} for order #{{Return.OrderNumber}} has been processed
content.fr-CA: Votre requête de remboursement #{{Return.ReturnNumber}} pour la commande #{{Return.OrderNumber}} a été émis
